dynmus.midnightconfig.title: Dynamic Music Config
dynmus.midnightconfig.searchRange.toolti: Number of blocks in each direction. 0 disables cave detection. Used for 'Cave Music' and 'Dynamic Pitch'
dynmus.midnightconfig.darknessCap.toolti: Light level of blocks used for cave detection.
dynmus.midnightconfig.darknessPercent.to: Percent of blocks with low light levels to trigger cave detection.
dynmus.midnightconfig.stonePercent.toolt: Percent of stone to trigger cave detection
dynmus.midnightconfig.pseudoMineshaftSea: Number of blocks in each direction. 0 disables mineshaft detection. Used to activate 'Dynamic Pitch' in mineshafts.
dynmus.midnightconfig.pseudoMineshaftPer: Percent of mineshaft blocks for mineshaft detection.
dynmus.midnightconfig.coldMusic.tooltip: Play cold music in cold biomes.
dynmus.midnightconfig.hotMusic.tooltip: Play hot music in hot biomes.
dynmus.midnightconfig.niceMusic.tooltip: Play nice music during the day.
dynmus.midnightconfig.downMusic.tooltip: Play down/sad music during the night and while it rains.
dynmus.midnightconfig.endCreativeMusic.t: Play original music composed by LudoCrypt when in creative mode in the End dimension.
dynmus.midnightconfig.endBossMusic.toolt: Play original music composed by LudoCrypt when fighting the dragon in the End dimension.
dynmus.midnightconfig.dynamicPitch.toolt: The closer the time is to the Anchor, the slower the music plays.
dynmus.midnightconfig.dynamicPitchAnchor: The anchor that the Dynamic Pitch uses. 18000 being midnight.
dynmus.midnightconfig.dynamicPitchFaster: Choose to play music faster, rather than slower
